title: User Journey Reporting Event metrics
description: For different journey events, we capture certain metrices along with the dimensions,This schema hold the metrics accociated with journey events

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Entered Journey
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when a journey instance is created

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Exited journey
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when a journey instance is flagged as ended

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Error in Journey Instance
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when an error is raised in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Eroor in step processing
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when an error occurs during an event processing meaning, during a step processing

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Error in action execution
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when an error occurs during an action execution

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Error in jump action
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when an error occurs during the jump action execution

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Error in enrichment
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when an error occurs during enrichment

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Event processed
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when an event as triggered a transition in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Action executed
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when an action is executed successfully in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Flow control executed
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when an action is executed successfully in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Executed jump action
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when an jump action is executed successfully in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Enrichment made successfully
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when an enrichment is executed successfully in a journey instance

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Jump action executed successfully
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: set to true when a jump action is executed successfully in a journey instance
